scripts.start:
docker-compose up && echo '

Server started at http://localhost:8080

'
scripts.restart:
docker-compose restart && echo '
Server restarted at http://localhost:8080
'
scripts.stop:
docker-compose down && echo '
Docker images and server were stoped
'
scripts.build:
docker-compose up --build && echo '

Docker image rebuilt and server started at http://localhost:8080

'
scripts.clean:
docker system prune -af && echo '
The Docker system has been cleaned
'
